name: SmartSkillbyIoTOnDemand
0:
”Alexa, Turn on kitchen fan”
”Alexa, set the power to forty percent on the kitchen fan”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
IoTOnDemand Smart Skill is the smart solution that lets you to control your home devices from anywhere. Use the "Smart Skill by IoTOnDemand" skill to manage all your IoTOnDemand Smart Devices. Simply enable the skill in the Alexa App and link your Alexa and IoTOnDemand accounts to get started.

1) With IoTOnDemand Smart Skill you can turn on/off the fan of your home from your FireTVs, Echo Show, Echo Spot, Echo Speakers (such as Echo, Echo Plus and Echo Dot). Simply say:
"Alexa, turn on kitchen fan"
"Alexa, turn off kitchen fan"

2) To set the speed of your fan, say:
"Alexa, set kitchen fan to 50 percent"
"Alexa, set the power to 40 percent on the kitchen fan"

For more information, please visit: https://www.iotondemand.com/our-showcased-solutions/smart-fan-c3204/
